PetFindr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    PetFindr

    PetFindr provides an R interface for the Petfinder.com API (V2). Once a user obtains an API key and secret from Petfinder, this package allows the user to retrieve information about animals by type, breed, location, and other useful characteristics.

    Installation

    You can install the the development version from GitHub with:

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("earl88/PetFindr")
